home.about.title: ABOUT THE COMPANY
home.about.subtitle: TOWER UP is a modern construction company specializing in the construction of premium-class residential complexes and commercial real estate.
home.about.text1: Our company has many years of experience in construction and implementation of large-scale projects.
home.about.text2: We create real estate that meets the highest requirements for comfort and quality.

home.features.quality.title: High Quality
home.features.quality.desc: We use only certified materials and modern construction technologies

home.features.design.desc: Each of our projects features modern architecture and thoughtful design
home.features.location.title: Excellent Location
home.features.location.desc: Our properties are located in promising and convenient areas of the city

construction.title: CONSTRUCTION OF FACILITIES
construction.subtitle: CONSTRUCTION
construction.services.title: Construction Services
construction.services.desc1: Our company provides a full range of services for the construction of facilities for various purposes: residential complexes, commercial buildings, industrial facilities, and infrastructure.
construction.services.desc2: We use modern construction technologies and quality materials, which allows us to create durable and functional facilities.
design.title: DESIGN
design.services.title: Design Services
design.services.desc1: We offer professional services for designing buildings and structures. Our team of experienced architects and engineers develops projects of varying complexity, taking into account all customer requirements and regulatory standards.
design.services.desc2: We use modern software to create detailed 3D models and project documentation, which allows visualizing the result before construction begins.
contact.title: CONTACTS
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us

contact.form.name: Your Name
contact.readyToHelp: We are always ready to answer your questions and help solve your tasks

contact.success.message: We have received your message and will contact you soon

contact.info.addressValue: Tashkent city, Sergeli district, MSG Yangi Qumariq. Landmark: GM Motor factory.
contact.map.title: Our Location
management.title: MANAGEMENT
management.team.title: About Our Team
management.team.desc1: The TOWER UP team consists of highly qualified professionals with many years of experience in construction, finance, and management. We are united by a common goal – to create unique facilities that beautify the urban landscape and make people's lives more comfortable.
management.team.desc2: Our management constantly monitors innovations in the industry, implements modern technologies and approaches to project management. Thanks to this, TOWER UP projects always feature high-quality execution, adherence to deadlines and budget.
management.careers.title: Join Our Team
management.careers.desc: TOWER UP offers unique opportunities for professional and career growth. We value initiative, creativity, and the desire for constant development.
management.careers.apply.desc1: Send your resume to hr@towerup.ru, indicating the position you are interested in in the subject line.
management.careers.apply.desc2: You can also familiarize yourself with current vacancies in the "Vacancies" section on our website.

trcBochka.title: SEC "BOCHKA"
trcBochka.subtitle: Modern multifunctional shopping and entertainment center in Tashkent region
trcBochka.description: Shopping and Entertainment Center "Bochka" is a new project of TOWER UP company, located in Tashkent region. The project is a modern complex with unique architecture, including retail spaces, restaurants, cinema, and entertainment areas.
trcBochka.overview.title: Innovative Shopping and Entertainment Center
trcBochka.overview.desc1: SEC "Bochka" is a unique architectural project in Tashkent region, combining innovative technologies and aesthetics of modern design. The central element of the facade, made in the shape of a barrel, symbolizes abundance and is the calling card of the complex.
trcBochka.overview.desc2: This multifunctional center offers not only retail spaces, but also various entertainment areas, restaurants, cafes and comfortable public spaces, creating a new attraction for residents and guests of the region.
trcBochka.features.floors.title: 5 floors
trcBochka.features.location.title: Tashkent region
trcBochka.features.opening.title: Opening in 2025
trcBochka.features.visitors.title: 10,000+ visitors
trcBochka.architecture.title: Architectural Masterpiece
trcBochka.architecture.subtitle: The unique design inspired by the barrel shape makes SEC "Bochka" a recognizable architectural object and a new landmark of the region
trcBochka.architecture.facade.title: Facade
trcBochka.architecture.facade.desc: The building's facade is made using modern materials - glass, metal and composite panels. A characteristic feature is the alternation of horizontal white stripes with panoramic windows, which creates a hovering effect and visually lightens the massive structure.
trcBochka.architecture.barrel.title: Barrel-shaped element
trcBochka.architecture.barrel.desc: The central architectural element, made in the form of a barrel from wooden lamellas, adds organicity to the building and refers to the name of the complex. This element is not only visually effective, but also functional - it serves as a source of natural lighting for interior spaces.
trcBochka.architecture.terraces.title: Terraces
trcBochka.architecture.terraces.desc: Open terraces are located on the side of the building, which can be used for cafes, restaurants and recreation areas. They provide additional space for visitors and picturesque views of the surrounding area.
trcBochka.architecture.modern.title: Modern Design
trcBochka.architecture.modern.desc: The combination of functionality and aesthetics creates a unique architectural solution that will be relevant for many years
trcBochka.zones.title: Zones and Functions
trcBochka.zones.subtitle: SEC "Bochka" offers a variety of entertainment and services for the whole family
trcBochka.zones.retail.title: Retail Area
trcBochka.zones.retail.desc: More than 100 stores of famous brands, boutiques of fashionable clothes, accessories, electronics and household goods.
trcBochka.zones.food.title: Food Court
trcBochka.zones.food.desc: Restaurants and cafes of various world cuisines, cozy coffee shops and fast food for a quick snack.
trcBochka.zones.entertainment.title: Entertainment
trcBochka.zones.entertainment.desc: Modern cinema, children's entertainment center, game zones and attractions for visitors of all ages.
trcBochka.zones.parking.title: Parking
trcBochka.zones.parking.desc: Spacious underground and ground parking with convenient entrance and electric charging stations.
trcBochka.zones.public.title: Public Spaces
trcBochka.zones.public.desc: Comfortable recreation areas, open terraces with beautiful views and green corners for pleasant pastime.
trcBochka.zones.offices.title: Office spaces
trcBochka.zones.offices.desc: Modern office spaces on the upper floors with panoramic views and all the necessary infrastructure.
trcBochka.gallery.title: Project Gallery
trcBochka.gallery.subtitle: Visualizations of the future shopping and entertainment center "Bochka"
trcBochka.cta.title: Become a tenant in SEC "Bochka"
trcBochka.cta.description: Open your business in a modern shopping center with high traffic. We offer favorable rental conditions and flexible cooperation formats.
newUzbekistan.title: DISTRICT "NEW UZBEKISTAN"
newUzbekistan.subtitle: Large-scale residential complex with modern infrastructure
newUzbekistan.hero.title: NEW UZBEKISTAN
newUzbekistan.hero.subtitle: A modern district for a comfortable life
newUzbekistan.hero.description: District "New Uzbekistan" is an ambitious project by TOWER UP, representing a new standard of urban living in harmony with nature
newUzbekistan.overview.title: PROJECT OVERVIEW
newUzbekistan.overview.subtitle: A new standard of comfort for Uzbekistan
newUzbekistan.overview.desc1: District "New Uzbekistan" is a large-scale residential complex that combines modern architecture, developed infrastructure, and environmental principles.
newUzbekistan.overview.desc2: The project includes residential buildings with various apartment layouts, commercial spaces, educational institutions, sports facilities, and recreational areas.
newUzbekistan.overview.desc3: The concept focuses on creating a comfortable living environment that meets international standards while preserving the national identity.
newUzbekistan.masterplan.title: MASTER PLAN
newUzbekistan.masterplan.subtitle: Thoughtfully designed urban space
newUzbekistan.masterplan.desc: The master plan of the district was developed with the participation of leading architects and urban planners, taking into account modern trends in urban development.
newUzbekistan.features.title: PROJECT FEATURES
newUzbekistan.features.subtitle: Key advantages of the district
newUzbekistan.features.architecture.desc: Buildings designed in a contemporary style with national elements
newUzbekistan.features.greenery.title: Green Spaces
newUzbekistan.features.greenery.desc: Over 30% of the territory allocated for parks and gardens
newUzbekistan.features.infrastructure.de: Schools, kindergartens, clinics, and commercial areas
newUzbekistan.features.parking.title: Parking Solutions
newUzbekistan.features.parking.desc: Underground and ground-level parking throughout the district
newUzbekistan.features.security.title: Security
newUzbekistan.features.security.desc: 24/7 surveillance and restricted access to residential areas
newUzbekistan.features.recreation.title: Recreation Areas
newUzbekistan.features.recreation.desc: Playgrounds, sports fields, and walking paths
newUzbekistan.location.title: LOCATION
newUzbekistan.location.subtitle: Strategic location with excellent connectivity
newUzbekistan.location.desc: District "New Uzbekistan" is situated in a rapidly developing area with convenient access to major highways and public transportation routes.
newUzbekistan.location.transport.title: Transport Accessibility
newUzbekistan.location.transport.desc: The complex is easily accessible by both private and public transport.
newUzbekistan.location.nature.title: Green Environment
newUzbekistan.location.nature.desc: The natural surroundings provide a healthy living environment.
newUzbekistan.apartments.title: APARTMENTS
newUzbekistan.apartments.subtitle: Variety of layouts to suit different needs
newUzbekistan.apartments.desc: The residential buildings offer apartments ranging from compact studios to spacious multi-room units, all featuring efficient layouts and high-quality finishes.
newUzbekistan.apartments.studio.title: Studio Apartments
newUzbekistan.apartments.studio.desc: Compact and functional spaces for singles and young couples
newUzbekistan.apartments.oneBedroom.desc: Balanced layouts with separate bedroom and living areas
newUzbekistan.apartments.premium.title: Premium Apartments
newUzbekistan.apartments.premium.desc: Exclusive layouts with premium finishes and panoramic views
newUzbekistan.apartments.floorLayoutDesc: Complete floor layout showing the arrangement of all apartment units in a single floor
newUzbekistan.apartments.footer: Floor plans are subject to availability. Contact our sales team for current pricing and availability of specific units.
aboutSection.title: ABOUT THE COMPANY
aboutSection.text: A leading construction company specializing in innovative projects and high-rise buildings. Since its foundation, the company has been striving to implement the most ambitious and complex architectural ideas, offering clients solutions at the highest level.
The foundation of our professionalism is preserving our own traditions and utilizing global innovations.
aboutSection.advantages.experience.title: COMPANY EXPERIENCE
aboutSection.advantages.experience.desc: We don't have to prove the quality of our products. Your recognition does it for us.
aboutSection.advantages.equipment.title: EQUIPMENT
aboutSection.advantages.equipment.desc: The technological superiority of our equipment is a distinguishing element of TOWERUP company.
featuresSection.subtitle: Building the future together
featuresSection.title: Realize your dreams with Tower Up
featuresSection.description: From design to project delivery — we provide a full cycle of construction work with quality guarantee and on time
projectsSection.sectionHeading: Innovative projects designed for the future
projectsSection.sectionDescription: Explore our signature projects that we create using modern technologies and uncompromising quality standards.

projectsSection.projects.kumaryk.title: Residential Complex "Kumaryk"
projectsSection.projects.kumaryk.descrip: Resort complex consisting of a 5* hotel and apartments with panoramic sea views and a private beach.

projectAdvantages.title: Advantages of RC «Pushkin»
projectAdvantages.description: Residential complex «Pushkin» is a standard of modern comfortable housing, combining a convenient location, quality construction, and care for future residents.
